name: Cult of a New God
description:
Alright, so much of the work is already completed. So many painstaking years of failure. All for this. Our Monster is ready. Our Monster is very hungry. So you need to see that it is properly fed. Or all of our work was for nothing. I knew what all of this was for. I hope you remember too. Either way, get to it.

- NULL
p.s. RTFM
